Here is the list of signs at $LINE and their scores:
1. Aries - 8/10 - Natural leadership and impulsiveness can sometimes get in the way, but overall a strong and adventurous sign.
2. Taurus - 6/10 - Practicality and reliability are major strengths, but stubbornness can hold them back from truly excelling.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Intellectual curiosity and versatility make Geminis highly adaptable and communicative, with only occasional restlessness.
4. Cancer - 7/10 - Emotional depth and nurturing abilities are exceptional, but moodiness and emotional vulnerability can be challenging to overcome.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Confidence and charisma shine bright, but pride and a tendency to dominate can sometimes overshadow their many positives.
6. Virgo - 9/10 - Analytical thinking and attention to detail make them highly competent and hardworking, with only occasional nitpicking and self-doubt.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Balance and harmony are hallmarks of this sign, but indecisiveness and a tendency to please others can sometimes hold them back.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Passionate intensity and penetrating insight make Scorpions highly perceptive and magnetic, with only occasional secrecy and possessiveness.
9. Sagittarius - 8/10 - Enthusiasm and optimism are infectious, but impatience and a tendency to dominate can sometimes overwhelm their good qualities.
10. Capricorn - 7/10 - Ambition and discipline are strong, but rigidity and a fear of failure can make it difficult for them to let go and enjoy the journey.
11. Aquarius - 9/10 - Unconventional thinking and humanitarian instincts make Aquarians highly innovative and forward-thinking, with only occasional aloofness and detachment.
12. Pisces - 8/10 - Empathetic sensitivity and creative imagination are remarkable, but dreaminess and a tendency to escape reality can sometimes hold them back from fully realizing their potential.
